findings.title: Contract Owner can stop transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop all sales excluding the owner.

findings.title: Contract Owner can exceed limit fees
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%.

findings.title: Contract Owner can remove liquidity pool tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to remove liquidity pool tokens and transfer them to the devâ€™s wallet.

findings.title: Public functions that are never called by the contract
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: Non-conformity to Solidity naming conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: Unused functions in the contract
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, and make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: Missing events for critical arithmetic parameters
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.
